sentences.en: "Opium" is a provocative, sensual, and voluptuous fragrance which makes all your senses vibrate.

sentences.en: As a rule , Scorpios have strong, voluptuous bodies and excellent recuperative powers.
sentences.cn: 概括来说, 天蝎座人有强壮的身体并且恢复能力强.

sentences.en: Beyond all question, this is the most voluptuous scene we have yet looked upon.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 我们从未见过这么娇媚的景致.

sentences.en: Having the curves of a full or voluptuous figure.

sentences.en: Like a voluptuous cat at the feet of a queen.

sentences.en: Lucullus spent the remainder of his days in voluptuous magnificence.
sentences.cn: 卢库勒斯用奢侈、华丽的方式度过他剩余的日子.

sentences.en: Nong Natt when she was younger and more voluptuous.

sentences.en: Nowadays an actress voluptuous beauty seems to be very popular.

She looked dazzling radiant rich brilliant voluptuous all at the same time.
